latest.title: Correction to AGM Notice
latest.content:
8 Sep 2025 12:00
RNS Number : 4260Y
Boohoo Group Plc
08 September 2025
For Immediate Release 8 September 2025
boohoo group plc
("Debenhams Group", "Debenhams" or the "Group")
Correction to AGM Notice
Further to the announcement released on 26 August 2025 and the publication and dispatch of a circular to shareholders containing notice of the resolutions to be considered at the AGM (the "Notice"), it has come to the attention of the Company that the Notice contains a typographical error. The Company wishes to notify of a correction to the Notice.
The correction relates to a typographical error in Resolutions 10, 11, 12 and paragraph (d) of Resolution 13 of the Notice (and in the corresponding explanatory notes to Resolutions 11, 12 and 13)that states, in each case, that the relevant authority shall apply until: '…the end of the Company's next annual general meeting or until the close of business on 19 September 2025…'.
Each resolution (and explanatory note as applicable) should instead state that the relevant authority shall apply until: '…the end of the Company's next annual general meeting or until the close of business on 19 September 2026…'.
As this is a patent error, no new Form of Proxy is required to be posted to shareholders, the resolutions in the Form of Proxy will apply to the notice and the resolutions as amended on the basis set out above and the Company will proceed to put the relevant resolutions as amended to the vote at the AGM.
A revised version of the Notice reflecting these amendments will be made available to shareholders on the Company's website:
www.debenhamsgroup.com/investors/agm/
.
Enquiries
Debenhams Group
Phil Ellis, Chief Financial Officer
Tel: +44 (0)161 233 2050
Zeus Capital - Nominated Advisor and Joint Broker
Nick Cowles / Dan Bate / James Edis
Tel: +44 (0)161 831 1512
Benjamin Robertson
Tel: +44 (0)20 3829 5000
Panmure Liberum - Joint Broker
Max Jones / Ailsa MacMaster / Gaya Bhatt
Sodali & Co - Financial PR Adviser
Tel: +44 (0)20 3100 2000
Ben Foster / Louisa Henry
Tel: +44 (0)20 3984 0114
About Debenhams Group
Debenhams Group is an online powerhouse in fashion, home, and beauty, serving millions of customers across five shopping destinations: Debenhams, Karen Millen, boohoo, MAN and PLT. Debenhams Group dates back to 1778 when William Clark, a retail pioneer of the time, opened the UK's first department store. Today, the Group is home to Debenhams-which was relaunched in 2021 as an online department store-and leading online fashion retailers, including boohoo, PLT, MAN, and Karen Millen.
This information is provided by RNS, the news service of the London Stock Exchange. RNS is approved by the Financial Conduct Authority to act as a Primary Information Provider in the United Kingdom. Terms and conditions relating to the use and distribution of this information may apply. For further information, please contact
rns@lseg.com
or visit
www.rns.com

Privacy Policy
.
END

latest.title: Director Dealing and Total Voting Rights
latest.content:
3 Dec 2025 14:00
RNS Number : 1186K
Boohoo Group Plc
03 December 2025
3 December 2025
boohoo group plc
(the "Company" or the "Group" or "Debenhams Group")
Director Dealing and Total Voting Rights
Director Dealing
Debenhams Group (AIM:DEBS), a leading online fashion group, announces that Mahmud Kamani, Co-Founder and Executive Vice Chair, and his closely associated persons, have purchased 3,000,000 ordinary shares of 1 pence each in the Company.
Carol Kane, Co-Founder and Executive Director has also purchased 2,000,000 ordinary shares of 1 pence each in the Company.
Following these transactions, Mahmud Kamani and his closely associated persons have a beneficial interest in 177,499,110 Ordinary Shares, representing approximately 12.70% of the Company's issued share capital, and Carol Kane has a beneficial interest in 29,807,818 Ordinary Shares, representing approximately 2.13% of the Company's issued share capital.
Total Voting Rights
As at 27 November 2025 the total number of Ordinary Shares and voting rights in the Company remains unchanged at 1,397,498,112. No Ordinary Shares are held in treasury. This figure for total number of Ordinary Shares may be used by shareholders as the denominator for the calculations by which they will determine if they are required to notify their interest in, or a change to their interest in, the Company under the Financial Conduct Authority's Disclosure Rules and Transparency Rule.
-ends-
Enquiries
Debenhams Group
Phil Ellis, Chief Financial Officer

AIM Rule 17 and Schedule 2(g) Disclosure
The Company provides the following update pursuant to AIM Rule 17 and Schedule 2(g) (v) of the AIM Rules.
John Goold, Independent Non-Executive Director of the Company, is an Independent Non-Executive Director of Oncimmune Holdings plc ("Oncimmune"), a life science services business. Oncimmune was placed into administration on 26 March 2025.
